<h3 class="normal mb3 mb7-sm mobile-hide">
About
</h3>
</div>
<div class="full-description js-full-description responsive-media formatted-lists">
<p>Hi Kickstarter! <b>We are gamers, techies and we love to play</b>. Today, we created DICEES®: the first customizable set of connected dice. <b>We like to think it’s a revolution that will allow all of us to rethink the way we play classic games, but also board games and role play games</b>! 
We need your support to launch the production of DICEES® and to develop a variety of games, possibilities linked to DICEES®, and to launch the community around what can be made… Because the opportunities of games and fun are limitless! 
Let’s explore all the faces of DICEES® together.</p><div class="template asset" contenteditable="false" data-id="23153198">

<p>Dice game is, without any doubts, one of the oldest game in the world. 
We wanted to give this game its own technological revolution! That’s why we are very excited to introduce DICEES®. 
DICEES® still have 6 faces, but here, <b>each face is equipped with a colored LEDs digital display</b>. But as of now, our dice are connected and it changes absolutely everything. 
Thanks to a mix of technologies contained inside a standard ¾” dice, DICEES® can show any patterns on each single face. Then, with any Bluetooth equipped device, the player can associate colors to their opponents, patterns to each faces, interact with anyone… anywhere! <b>DICEES® will even keep up the score for you! </b>
Far from the eyes? Not far from the dice! Play with your friends all over the world! DICEES® indicates to your device when a player has rolled the DICEES®, the face on which it dropped on and all the necessary information to ensure that the games runs smoothly. Worried that your friends would cheat to win? DICEES® has all the sensors needed to prevent a player from cheating, and will let you know if someone tried to fool you! </p>

<p>Poker, Yams, Role Play like D&D, Backgammon, board games, craps, etc. 
With DICEES® you can play any dice games you want. You got it, DICEES® is universally customizable and with a compatible app you can play the game you want! 
Think outside of the box here! <b>There is literally NO limits: create your OWN game. 
Poker, Yams, Role play like D&D, Backgammon, Monopoly  ….
With DICEES®</b> you can play any dice games you want, because DICEES® is universally customizable, with a compatible App you can play the one you want: Poker, Yams, …</p><div class="template asset" contenteditable="false" data-id="23190706">

<p><b>DICEES® connects to your smartphone, tablet or computer</b>, allowing any compatible app to synchronize with your DICEES® and keep up the score, interact or react to the result you just thrown, the player who’s up next, the round of the game, the importance of the next thrown, etc. <b>Your creativity is the only limit here.</b></p><div class="template asset" contenteditable="false" data-id="23153971">
<figure>
<img alt="" class="fit js-lazy-image" data-src="https://ksr-ugc.imgix.net/assets/023/153/971/ed0d075f91a86e2bdba88ddd8bcde13c_original.gif?ixlib=rb-1.1.0&w=680&fit=max&v=1541463677&auto=format&gif-q=50&q=92&s=528be2e0f667247263222c35bdafcf6f" src="https://ksr-ugc.imgix.net/assets/023/153/971/ed0d075f91a86e2bdba88ddd8bcde13c_original.gif?ixlib=rb-1.1.0&w=680&fit=max&v=1541463677&auto=format&frame=1&q=92&s=b0dcb53db2cb84729d190a96aa5325c5">

</div>


<p>Developers Standard Apps! We want DICEES® to become not only the dice game’s standard device we also want it to become an interface like a mouse, a keyboard. So <b>we are opening our SDK to all developers</b> who want to allow people to play they their games with DICEES®. </p>

<p>DICEES® are the best connected dice for Role Play Games.<br>You can simulate "n-faces-dice" (4 - 6 - 10 - 12 - 20 - 30 - 100, etc.). Imagine you can change colors, faces, number of activated dice according to the previous result.<br><b>DICEES® will come with its own app for Game Mastering and full role play game</b> creation. Create your rules, your conditions and loops, you can even create statistics during the game. As Game Master, you can hide result on the dice for special events, show player LvL on his dice, etc. </p><div class="template asset" contenteditable="false" data-id="23177028">

<p><b>Developers, create your apps with DICEES® </b>DICEES® SDK is OPEN and really EASY to use!
We want Dicees to become not only the dice games standard device we want it also to become an interface like a mouse, a keyboard.</p><p>So <b>we are opening our SDK to all developers </b>who want to allow people to play their games with DICEES® </p>

<h1 id="h:were-dicees">We’re DICEES®<br>
</h1><p>We’re DICEES® team and more specifically François Royen, Robin Murgia and Jérémie Bours. We’re designers and electronics engineer. We’re the guys behind projects and companies like iol strategic design, Tole, IoT-D, Habilis Product Design, … 
It is an absolute obsession of ours to see an idea evolve from an intangible state all the way through the launch, and we couldn’t be more excited to be sharing share our latest passion project DICEES® with you here on Kickstarter. </p><div class="template asset" contenteditable="false" data-id="23211792">

<p><b>DICEES® is a patented technology</b>. Be sure to choose DICEES® : a smart, powerful and premium device, the reference of connected dice! </p><h1 id="h:a-little-bit-history">A little bit history of the origin of a classic dice</h1><p>Dice game is without doubts, one of the oldest games in the world. We were already practicing it in India, during the Vedic period, 2 thousand years before Jesus Christ. Etruscan and roman citizens, Arabic countries and Spanish people loved to play with faith with those six faces. One of them was a flower drawn (ǎz-zǎhr, in ancient Arab) and, in latin, dice, the dice’s game, and hazard, were designated with the word « Alea ».
As old as the world, the dice game has not much evolved since. But it was used for a lot of goals. We use it “naked” for poker, or 421, or for an accessory in games like goose game, parcheesi, or backgammon, or even Monopoly, for making the pawns move forward.
</p><p><br>
</p>
</div>
<div class="mb3 mb10-sm mb3 js-risks">
<div class="mobile-show py3"></div>
<h3 class="normal mb4">Risks and challenges</h3>
<p>All that needed to be done is to make that concept real. Our “makers” team composed of two designers and an electronics developper went quickly to work. Skills and long working hours transformed their dreams into a magical reality. “All had to be hosted in a very limited space: LEDs, battery, Bluetooth. It took thousand hours, prototyping, tests/mistakes, to give birth to a viable solution, the one seen in this video”.</p>

<p>Now we need your help to develop the final device in mass production and more In-DICEES-App games.
<br />We believe in our project! We can’t wait for you to be a part of the DICEES® community.</p>

<script>
  var channelUrl = window.location.protocol + "//" + window.location.host + "/channel.html",
    needs_autologin = true && !$('body').is('.skip_autologin'),
    needs_refresh = true && false;
  
  window.fbAsyncInit = function() {
    FB.init({
      appId: window.fb_app_id,
      channelUrl: channelUrl,
      status: true,    // check login status
      cookie: true,    // enable cookies to allow the server to access the session
      xfbml: true,     // parse XFBML
      logging: false,  // turn off logging,
      version: 'v2.8'
    });
  
    FB.getLoginStatus(function (response) {
      if (response.status === 'connected') {
        if (read_cookie("logout_from_fb")) {
          FB.logout();
          destroy_cookie("logout_from_fb");
        } else if (needs_autologin) {
          $.get("/fb/autologin.js", {'fbsr': response.authResponse.signedRequest});
        } else if (needs_refresh && 0 == response.authResponse.userID) {
          $.get("/fb/refresh.js", {'fbsr': response.authResponse.signedRequest});
        }
      } else {
        if (read_cookie("logout_from_fb")) {
          destroy_cookie("logout_from_fb");
        }
      }
    })
  
    $(document).trigger('fb:loaded');
  };
  
  
  // Load the SDK Asynchronously
  (function(d){
    var js, id = 'facebook-jssdk'; if (d.getElementById(id)) {return;}
    js = d.createElement('script'); js.id = id; js.async = true;
    js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js";
    d.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(js);
  }(document));
</script>
